fullplot: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.
plot: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.
title: Left Behind

tomatoes.consensus: Yea verily, like unto a plague of locusts, Left Behind hath begat a further scourge of devastation upon Nicolas Cage's once-proud filmography.
